programme.title: The opening of the Berlin Wall, 1989
programme.short_synopsis: Gorbachev proclaims that Germany will not become a capitalist state after reunification.
programme.medium_synopsis: The opening of the Berlin Wall, the origins of Democracy as the system of government in America, and Gorbachev's warning that Germany will not inevitably turn to capitalism.
